title: “Show your work” makes a triumphant return
description: Next year will herald the return of open source culture in newsrooms. But first, some history: In the spring of 2008, I was working at ProPublica. It was a month or two before we launched. A colleague and I had lunch with Aron Pilhofer, head of a new interactive technology team at The New York...
